DOC.brief_summary: The primary purpose study evaluate safety , tolerability , pharmacokinetics pharmacodynamics multiple ascend dos PF-05175157 healthy volunteer patient type 2 diabetes mellitus .
DOC.brief_title: A Study PF-05175157 Healthy Volunteers Type 2 Diabetic Patients
DOC.criteria: Healthy male and/or female subject age 18 55 year , inclusive . Healthy define clinically relevant abnormality identify detailed medical history , full physical examination , include blood pressure pulse rate measurement , 12 lead ECG clinical laboratory test . In addition , subject must normal pulmonary function test normal ocular examination . Body Mass Index ( BMI ) 25.5 35.5 kg/m2 ; total body weight > 50 kg ( 110 lb ) . Women must nonchildbearing potential . Subjects type 2 diabetes : HbA1c ≥7.0 % ≤10.0 % metformin , ≥6.5 % ≤9.0 % patient require washedoff SU DPP4i . For subject type 2 diabetes , due possible effect disposition , CYP P450 3A4/5 2D6 substrate coadministered study medication . Evidence history clinically significant hematological , renal , endocrine , gastrointestinal , cardiovascular , hepatic , psychiatric , neurologic , allergic disease ( include drug allergy , exclude untreated , asymptomatic seasonal allergy time dose ) . Evidence history chronic ongoing current pulmonary disease . History smoke past 5 year history smoke 10 pack year , history evidence habitual use ( non smoke ) tobacco nicotine containing product within 3 month Screening , positive cotinine test Screening Day 3 . Active ocular disease include infection , glaucoma , seasonal allergy , dry eye symptom retinal/optic nerve disease .
